compression.comment_ols: Golden ratio φ — compress branch when size > φ × system average
compression.comment_min: Never compress a branch with fewer than 3 nodes

decay.comment_lambda: Ebbinghaus forgetting curve rate — 0.5 empirically grounded
decay.comment_backbone: Backbone nodes are permanent — zero decay ever

similarity.comment_dedup: Above this — update existing node, don't insert
similarity.comment_retrieval: Below this — node not surfaced in injection. Lower values suit small corpora; raise toward 0.70 for large production corpora.
similarity.comment_unrelated: Below this — node is unrelated to query

injection.comment_top_n: Maximum nodes injected into context per query
injection.comment_budget: Hard cap on total characters injected — never blow context window

archival.comment_cold: Branch is cold when its access ratio falls below 10% of system mean
